main_definition: Ago refers to a period of time that has passed since an event occurred.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To measure the amount of time that has passed from a specific point in time until now, used with dates or hours
meanings_and_examples.example: The meeting took place three days ago.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Indicates an action performed before another event occurred in the past
meanings_and_examples.example: I had already finished my homework when I went to bed last night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to express a distant past time, typically more than a few years ago
meanings_and_examples.example: She was born over 20 years ago.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Suggests an action or event that occurred prior to another action or event in the present
meanings_and_examples.example: The painting had been restored before it was put on display.
